place_description: Stylish coffee bar inside Good Bottle Co. for pour-overs, cold brew & espresso, plus baked goods.

reviews_data.review_text: I was across the street two bites into a mediocre bagel and some not delicious coffee when I realized this place was next door so I walked over and got the tasty vanilla latte and the fantastic Hex special!  Don't settle for mediocrity we only get one life!

Hex is a staple in Camp North End! The coffee drinks are pretty good here, but often on the sweeter side. Love the Japanese-inspired menu, but wish there were more vegetarian options or accommodations.
Very cute place, had the tonic with matcha instead of espresso and it was great! The barista was really kind too :)

Super cool space. Loved the coffee shots and the wide variety of options that were offered for them. The barista we spoke to was really knowledgeable about each one and took the time to explain the process behind the brewing method. The West Java Indonesia Ciwidey Natural was incredibly juicy and I loved the fruity notes. Ordered a katsu sandwich to split that was probably one of the better coffee shop meals I've had.

I was having a pretty good cup of coffee from Hex in their outdoor section when I overheard two young women talking about the Breakfast Special. After talking to them, I was sold. I ordered and I have to tell you that it was delicious. The bread, to die for. Finding a breakfast place is hard. Look no more, at least when you are in that area.  I definitely recommend you try the Hex Breakfast Special.
Love the vibe here but the WiFi network sucks. Every time I come here I have an issue with a spotty connection or slow connection. Drinks are good, alittle pricey.
Great coffee in a minimalist, relaxing atmosphere.

Good luck to the three hipsters working there Sunday AM.  They clearly aren't happy with their present lot in life.
I can't rate the food/coffee as I couldn't figure out where you're supposed to order & none of the three bothered to help.
We love this place, amazing coffee and stylish interior.
Service is very slow. Coffee is just ok. Very pricey for what you get.
Looove to grab a coffee at HEX and wander around the shops at Camp North End! Their seasonal lattes are always super tasty and creative! Their food is the hidden gem though!
Very busy at a central part of Camp North End. Not a ton of flavoring options for drinks, but they're nice quality and the staff were great.
Neplokho tut, khoroshii kofe. Osobo perekusit' tut ne poluchitsia, kakie-to poleznye sukhari prodaiut) A v tselom, vpolne atmosferno.
I think this is the place where you can get the best coffee in the area. Plenty of space and delicious drinks!
Great coffee, great breakfast, friendly staff, nice place

Loved my time at Hex. The baristas were very friendly and the menu was straightforward. My brother got a nat wine and a standard latte, I got an iced cortado. Both coffee drinks were smooth and delicious. Food menu looks hip and Japanese - compelling but wasn't hungry at the time. Interior vibes are modern / industrial, simultaneously encouraging getting work done & socializing.

Will definitely come back for the food options the next time I'm in the area!

Great atmosphere! Lots of seating options, inside and out. They have some unique seating stools as well.
Great bar area.
I got a latte- it was decent; got a decaf americano for my wife, which wasn't very good.
I'd like to come back and try some of their baked goods and another coffee when I'm at next at Camp North End!
Very cool vibes here.

Fat barista women was rude, she added double matcha in my drink which tasted horrible and she  basically handed it to me saying she put double matcha and was not going to fix it and make it right !!!!!
I love their yogurt and nola. Great spot for studying or meeting with a client/friend. I've had wine here a couple times as well! There's a parking deck just around the corner that gives 3 hours free

Wonderful space with lots of natural light & large patio. The "education" room is the perfect place to lounge & chat or read. The food program is a hidden gem. They carry some top-notch light roasts from their roastery, and the coffee shots on-bar are absolutely stellar.

Coffee was a bit of a let down here. We ordered a batch brew coffee and a mocha. The batch brew was quite watery and it felt like the character of the coffee was diluted.
The mocha was barely warm when it came to us.
The bakery was fine.

My latte here was absolutely delicious...super smooth with a rich balanced flavour...thankfully as the service received at the til was terrible!  Nothing friendly...no eye contact and I was told I couldn't pay with cash.  We were visiting from Canada and prefer to use cash so I brought this up and asked if I could give "the exact amount".  He sighed and said fine...so I attempted to give him cash with a tip included and was told I couldn't that I had to give him the exact amount of $...It turned out I was literally one penny short of the exact change and we ended up in a stand off...thankfully the gentleman who was infront of me in line covered my penny so I was able to get my drink...
Unfortunately The barista who actually made my drink wasn't a whole lot better with his customer service skills.
Thank goodness the latte was worth it!

One of my favorite coffee shops in Charlotte. The coffee is top notch and the yogurt is out of this world! They have a very unique menu with some Japanese influences. Perfect place to hang out or to do some work on your laptop.

Ambiance: I would describe this place as hipster warehouse millennial core. Of course, this is Camp North End so everything is warehouse and that vibe. The vibe is more sterile than cozy, but it's not a bad thing. The center of the shop is where you order coffee, the one side is tables and chairs, the opposite side is a kind of free form stair seating with some window facing stools.

Password as of Nov 2023 to "Hex Guest WiFi" is "foursixfournine"

Food/Drink
Vanilla iced latte was my drink, and it was smaller than I'd like it to be for the price, but was delicious.
The rice porridge was very tasty, the pork was quite tender.

Definitely pop by if you're in Camp North End and want a pick me up, or just need a place to work, study, or meet up.

Been to this location a few times and their drinks and service are great. The food... I don't think I'll eat there again. I had the Japanese Curry and it was terrible, way over salted and mostly no flavor. All I could taste was turmeric and salt. I love Japanese curry so this was super disappointing.
Great stop for a late lunch and an espresso.

Evening shift was not polite. Showed up 10 minutes to closing and they all just stared, not welcoming at all, no hello, BUT a "we close in 6 minutes" when it got to our turn to order. While waiting for our drinks, one worker came over to seating area where several people were sitting and said "we close at 3pm today, it's 3:02, if you could grab your drinks and leave". Unfortunelty they were still making our two drinks so she had to wait until 3:05 to lock the doors.

Coffee was great!
Hex Coffee at Camp North End is a solid spot! It's has modern, corporate interior. Solid brews and chic ambiance. Lots of seating. A nice addition to Camp North End.
Nice place, but didn't feel as if the evening shift was quite inviting. Seemed standoff-ish...not many options  as far as wine, all bitter. Didn't eat because the kitchen was closed at 3pm.
Maybe the coolest coffee spot in CLT!

If you're a serious coffee lover this is the place for you in Charlotte. They roast the best beans that I've had in Charlotte, and all the baristas know how to make some great coffee. If you're a coffee lover this is a must visit.
The people were super nice, place cool and the cappuccino was one of the best I've had!
Friendly staff, good food and beverages. But the seats are no comfortable to sit in for a long time. At least for for my 6'2" frame.

I love this new location in Camp North End. The original one was so small and limited items. It is a beautiful location. I went in over the weekend and it was quite busy so maybe that's why I felt like the service wasn't great. I always ask for suggestions when I go to different coffee shops so that I can try something different or something that is popular. I asked what the persons favorite drink was and they seemed irritated and kind of mumbled something. i decided to just pick a vanilla latte and get out of the way. I'm definitely going to give it another shot and maybe I came on an "off" day.
Very busy but had great service. Excellent iced coffee.

HEX is phenomenal! This was my first time visiting their new location and it was worth the wait. The new space is beautiful and there is a good amount of seating both indoors and outside. I ordered their oat milk latte and enjoyed every sip!

Hex has nailed the trifecta of great beverage, food, and ambiance (with a little help from camp north end's vibe itself).

I find myself here on a weekly basis, whether to meet a friend, spend an hour or two having a working coffee break, or lounging with the family outdoors.

The food has generally been awesome except my latest experience where I noticed quite a bit of blue and red food coloring just as I was finishing my yogurt. It was quite off putting and pretty much ensured I won't be getting that again.
We tried their Kabocha Latte and it wasn't too sweet! I like it over Starbucks' pumpkin spice. The interior is nice and peaceful, service seems solid as well.

I enjoyed my first visit my chai latte was perfect. Love the creative seating. This is a great spot to catch up on some work. Plenty of charging ports for tablets and computers. Creative food menu nothing too heavy. The menu  was light enough to snack on while you work without feeling sluggish from a heavy meal.
$14 for 4 greasy chicken nugets
Great atmosphere, coffee and tea. It is cold in there so if you are working from there I would bring a jacket.
Tried something different by ordering the spam musabi, and it was a good choice. It was delicious! The stand-out was the delicious baked goods they offer.

Atmosphere is phenomenal

Cold brew is phenomenal

Cold brew at Hex > Cold brew at Dunkin Donuts

Atmosphere is great. It's bright and conducive to a work or conversation type of environment.

For the coffee, I only have a partial option ion because I've only tried their cold brew. I'm not a fan at all. The cold brew had a sour taste.  It tasted almost as if they brewed hot coffee, poured it into a pitcher and placed it into the fridge.  The cold brew tasted sour, but not as acidic as hot coffee. Maybe it's the coffee grounds or maybe they have to adjust the coarseness of their grinds.

I make cold brew at home on days I don't feel like going to a coffee house and it doesn't have the same sour taste. So not sure how they are brewing theirs, but it needs to be adjusted. It was nearly as bad as Dunkin Donuts ICED coffee.
If you have high standards for your coffee stuff, this is the place to come.

Came by around mid way on the weekend expecting it to be full. Was very spacious and open enough to sit down and do some work. I ended up ordering a Iced Vanilla Latte and and the Karaage. As a dedicated coffee drinker, the latte was spot on. Not too sweet and had the afternote of coffee I personally look forward to. The Karaage (fried chicken) came out really quickly and also tasted great. Would definitely recommend and plan on coming back myself one day.

We usually go to local coffee shops on Saturdays so we decided to try somewhere new because we had never been here or to camp north end. The space was really cool and my husband got the avocado toast, which was delicious. Unfortunately I was super disappointed with my matcha.  My usual coffee order is a vanilla matcha with oat milk- so that's what I got.  It was the color of oat milk with the slightest hint of green and it tasted like vanilla oat milk with maybe a dash of matcha.  I saw another person with a to go matcha and it looked green like most matcha does - so not sure what happened with mine.
Great place! Their coffee is pretty smooth and vanilla latte is just perfect (not too sweet). Also, enjoyed their beans at home.
The coffee selection is top notch. Love the ambience and the location is designed very tastefully!
Great coffee! Interesting, stylish space. Really like it!

One of the most beautiful coffee shops I've been in. My husband and I ordered two different kinds of pour-overs. We liked the fruitier guji the best. Despite the cup having sweet flavor notes, it was very balanced and thus drinkable. Their new location has a kitchen and we came back for lunch. I ordered the waffle with chicken, everything has an Asian twist. But they really pulled it off. My husband works in coffee professionally. Would go back next time we're in Charlotte for sure.
Unique food combinations, good coffee, and a cool and relaxed atmosphere. Will definitely be returning.

I ordered a waffle and Iced Vanila Latte with oatmilk. If you like sweet vanilla latte, you need to ask them to add more syrup. But it has a very good flavor of coffee beans( in my opinion). And the waffle tasted a bit burnt, but overall, it was delicious. It had a downtown atmosphere, and at the same time, the small garden was so beautiful :)
It looks like a good place to hang out with your friends or studying.
The only downside from my experience is that I felt unwelcome here. Staff wasn't friendly. Made me hesitate to visit again. But I'm trying to think that anyone might have had a bad day.

_ _ _
7/10/2023
I got the Yogurt& Nola. Taro yogurt with peach and nuts. It was really good. My kids liked it too :)

I was absolutely blown away by this coffee shop. The entire dining area is beautiful, the food presentation was amazing, and the Asian inspired food items tasted incredible. I got the special with the white miso waffles and candied chicken, others got the chicken sandwich, the taro yoghurt, and the porridge. Everyone was extremely impressed with the quality of the food and the taste of the coffee. Will be suggesting to everyone and will definitely be back.
The coffee was cold. And I was not 12oz
Great spot! Awesome coffee and food!

The new space is a cool mix of seating options, though the table seating is a little cramped. I was bummed that only Form (or Function, can't remember now...) was available on drip when there are so many other exciting options, but that's me being a coffee nerd. Service was solid, food was decent. Overall, wonderful addition to Camp North End. Though, I'll be honest that I miss the smaller, cozier, chill roastery shop.

The new location is gorgeous! And, as always, the coffee is superb! Service was not a five star experience. I said hello first and asked the person behind the counter how they were doing.... After giving them plenty of time to greet me and ask what I wanted. The employees just didn't have a welcoming vibe. Which is a bummer because the staff in my previous experience at the old location were always friendly and engaging.
Got a pour over, iced coffee and a double chocolate brownie, all fantastic!
Brand new place. Good brew, poor salesmanship.
lkhdm@ mmtzh mqbl lml ws`rhm jydh wystHq

HEX is the crown jewel of camp north end. They have amazing coffee and also serve food. This is a place you must check out if you are in the area. Plenty of outdoor seating as well as indoor seating, nice minimalistic cafe. Try the draft vanilla latte on a hot day. This is the most recent location, they moved over from the roastery building.
Classic in-house flavored coffees  Pleasant ambience on the inside and outside as well  Staff was very polite in explaining the specialities

Visit: 4/22 9:10-9:40ish
For someone basic the coffee might be considered tastey buttttttt it was the worst chai latte I've had in a long long time. I waited a total of 30 minutes from walking in the door to receiving my latte for it to be served lukewarm. After taking 2 sips, I threw it away. I can replace the 10 bucks I spent, but the time I spent waiting for subpar coffee, I can't get back.

Stars for atmosphere; throw some lo-if music on and add more seating, place would be dope.
Had no idea yogurt and granola could be this good. Cool place, in an area surrounded by cool places.

Hex's new location is stunning, the food is amazing and absolutely worth a trip. We got iced coffee, avocado tartine (which came on a piece of sourdough that was to die for) and the miso waffle (which knocked my socks off). Will 100% make this a frequent breakfast spot, it was so beautiful inside that if you just come for the pictures it's enough.
they are closed but google maps shows it's open, isn't it hard to point out that you're closed and wasting people's time visiting this awful, dirty place???

Went here while visiting friends. Very, very good coffee. I was very impressed. Since being back home I have already ordered from them. Highly recommend stopping by for a hand crafted drink, which they do well, and a bag of beans. Try the Form or Function.

It's a cute coffee shop in Camp North End. The menu is very very limited (according to the girl taking orders with the "why are you here?" attitude), everything is made in house that's why the menu is limited.
I got the vanilla latte. It was amazing! The barista did a great job on flavor and presentation.
I don't know if I will return since the girl made me feel as if I didn't belong. If y'all know of any other good coffee spots in Camp North End, let me know!
One of my favorite roasters. This place serves top notch beans from a variety of sources roasted to perfection. Glad to have found this gem in North Carolina.
Good coffee! I like that they roast their own coffee in house. They will be moving to a bigger place within the camp in 2-4 weeks according to the barista.
Love their coffee. And their house-made chai is the best in town!
Chill atmosphere and great coffee! One of the best coffee in Charlotte
Great coffee, calming atmosphere

The perfect little coffee roastery.  The coffee is always fresh and delicious.  The staff friendly and efficient.  My only (little) complaint is the coffee is never hot.  My vanilla latte is still delish but always warm not hot.

Ordered an Americano. I've been underwhelmed by the coffee from every single local coffee from every single local coffee shop, but this was excellent. I was pleasantly surprised to find it was a light roast with a nice mild, fruity character, and the espresso was well extracted without being bitter or sour. It's nice to see a place that takes their coffee quality more seriously than having good ambience.

Will be back!

Great coffee and selection of self roasted bean.
Ask for it to be a little hotter and it's perfect.
Happy
Really friendly folks here. Got to watch the staff taste some new blends. They were so nice to stop and talk to us about what they were doing.

We've concluded that this is the best coffee in Charlotte. We've tried a lot of places but always come back here for a delicious drip and cappuccino with oat milk! They use Oatly too, which is one of my favorites. Also the girl that usually works there is super nice! Keep being awesome!

The espresso was too fruity and burnt, the chai was not too bad. Reading the menu on a mirror was difficult and delayed the line.

I feel as the shop is way too tiny, it's a big space but the coffee area is so confined and same with the dining area. It seems 80% of their area is for storage. I would have loved to drink and relax, but I felt like I was on top of the 4 other people in the shop.
Not a great experience. Won't be returning

The batch brew coffee was some of the best I've ever had. Sometimes batch brews don't really bring out all the notes in coffees, so I usually prefer pour overs, but this batch brew was so good! Cool atmosphere outside the shop also & very nice people working there. 

We also were able to bring our dog in which was nice so one of us didn't have to wait outside when ordering :)

Great espresso. I was a little let down that there was not sparking water included with it. It was also given in a small paper cup, so the experience was not exactly thrilling. Very limited seating inside the shop, but tons all around outside.
Have been the top coffee roaster in Charlotte for years. Have Top-notch craft beverages and the crew is the best.
Tbh coffee taste like refried beans straight out the can and the chai tastes like chai water. 6.50 for a small coffee is insanity

Best coffee in the city. Nestled way back at the end of the boileryard in Camp North End, Hex is a bit of a secret. But it is worth the trek here for the quality java that they deliver. They don't have a huge selection, but I think that lets them focus on high quality coffee. Just had a vanilla latte today, and it's delicious as always.
The best dang chai tea latte I've ever had in my entire life.
Great coffee and friendly, helpful staff!
Nom nom. The whole vibe is awesome. Wish they had more bakery items but the coffee I got was phenomenal. Smooth but still has a bold flavor.
Good cup of cold joe (brew) plus extremely healthy ()pastries
Super friendly staff. Amazing cold brew mix. Latte super rich. Well done.
tempatnya nyaman

The seasonal fruity pebble latte is amazing! I stopped here on my way back to Atlanta and was impressed at the lofty light feel of the shop. The smell of coffee beans being ground and fresh poured espresso definitely makes this worth a visit!
Tried the cortado and vanilla latte. Both were great!!

I tried the spring special: the cereal milk and espresso drink. It was soo good - not too sweet but the cereal milk gave such a good flavor. The barista was so helpful when deciding what to order and made my drink great.
Their cereal milk coffee is next level
Amazing coffee! The barista was very nice, will definitely be coming back.
Tasty and cute shirts!
HEX is awesome. Def love the coffee and the place, and can't wait to brew my Kenya over the next week.
Such a cool little spot! Not much traffic Tuesday during mid-day! Their vanilla draft latte is super good and different and the woman who attended us was super nice!
Enjoy regular coffee.
A nice little coffee shop at camp north end. We got the hex coffee beans and a latte with oat milk. Coffee tastes really really good. One of my best coffee spots in Charlotte now!

6/5 . Best baristas in a 50 mile radius.
Zack is especially good at cappuccinos
Recommended Draft Vanilla Latte or Toasted Marshmallow
It smells good
Just the right amount of sass for my delightful morning cup! Overall delectable and tasteful eye-opening craft coffee experience. Thank you Hex.
Beans, aesthetics, espresso and pour over on point.
Great Spot. Looking for the upcoming upgrade.

There is not a lot of seating inside to enjoy your coffee while it's cold out. For that reason I give it 4 stars. The coffee was overall good. I unfortunately had to take my coffee out to the cold weather.
Relaxed space with strong coffee :)
Best vanilla latte ever
Excellent coffee & service!
Great coffee and excellent customer service. Polina and Zach were super nice and helpful.
Best espresso bar and roaster in Charlotte for my many visits a year. Always in the light to medium range of roasts, flavorful and fruit forward.

I had the drip coffee and an espresso with milk. Both were excellent. Bought a bag of beans home, which also turned out excellent. This is as good as any coffee you can get anywhere in the USA. The muffin was a little "wet" inside, but flavor was good. Would go back without a doubt.
Great coffee, full of flavor and a solid menu. Staff was friendly and knowledgeable. Great, funky little area too. I can't wait to go back and highly recommend others check this place out!
Nice coffee shop, cortado was excellent, machiato was excellent as well

Great service. Amazing taste.

You can actually taste the bean instead of a bunch of sugar.

Most importantly, the staff wears masks and the space is super sanitary.

Would definitely recommend this small business instead of the regular coffee giants.
Finally found good coffee in Charlotte after living here for nearly a year. This is hands down the best coffee I've had. Not a lot of seating inside and no plugs to charge your laptop though.
I love it, good vibes too
Great atmosphere even better coffee. Absolutely would recommend
Damn good cup of coffee.

Nat and "Zack White" were on it. Quick and quality service! Our espresso was delicious and the milk had ideal texture. This is a must stop for anyone desiring incredible, professional coffee. Can't wait to visit again!
Good coffee, very nice space and a great place to relax in Camp North End. Some of their drinks are more elaborate so just be prepared to wait long. Otherwise a great spot

Had an amazing experience here. I ordered an espresso and batch brew and both were brewed to perfection. The espresso was on the lighter side as far as mouth feel and thickness. It had the perfect amount of acidity and overall was a great espresso.

Batch brew was remade just for me because the current brew wasn't up to the baristas standard. Ended up buying a bag of coffee because of how impressed I was with the flavor and attention to detail to the craft.

Came in to try their espresso and was helped by Sean who took the time to educate a newbie to the home barista hobby.   The coffee was excellent, service superb and the overall experience second to none.   I highly recommend Hex to anyone that wants a great cup of coffee in Charlotte.

Nice place to relax, people watch, eat good, etc.  Really nothing but great experiences here, so I will be back. The place has a nice atmosphere. Feeling here is similar to a cafe in San Jose I liked.

Drove here but almost missed it...glad I didn't!
It is hard to miss as it is inside Good Bottle Co.
The seating is limited and the majority of the location is taken up by the beer racks.
Having said that,  it is a nice place with a very good espresso  (iced mocha was my drink of choice).
The longer I was inside the more comfortable it felt and by the time I left, I made a note to make sure to return.
I also like the music choice.  It fit the establishment.
Great coffee and service! It's not the best I've ever had but if I lived in the area, I would definitely frequent the spot.
SO GOOD. Amazing espresso. Zach is great & fun to talk to (beside the fact that he makes killer coffee).
Good coffee
The most delicious vanilla latte ever  love this place!

They have really great coffee but the last 5 times I've went they've been closed. I went on different days, times of day, etc and there is no posting of hours. Would love to go again but not worth the drive at this point
Thank you Zak and Sydney for great first-time experience! Quality stuff you've got
Fun place for coffee!
Great Coffee, Good location, friendly staff, although a little more seating would be ideal.
Delicious coffee! Nice outdoor seating.
Very cool staff, good place for coffee and beer

Hex was incredible! I got handed a free latte outside the shop and WOW it was delicious! It was really kind of them to give out a free coffee and even better that it tasted great! Definitely will be stopping by there again!
Delicious coffee and a cool vibe! They made the most incredible Teddy bear latte art for my sons hot chocolate- a teddy bear!
Looks like they are going under.poor selection and nothing here to recommend
Favorite coffee in Charlotte. I just want to bathe in your mocha
Love the decor and design here
Awesome spot good coffee. Super clean and sharp, simple decor.
Delicious coffee
Hex is hands down the best coffee in town! If you're looking for excellent locally-roasted coffee Hex is the place to go.

I'd love to go back if I'm ever in town again. Really loved hex. Great coffee, cool little find. They even were trying to not have much waste at all, which I really appreciate. I had their ginger turmeric latte and it was really fantastic iced!

HEX Espresso Bar is one of the best coffee spots in Charlotte. They make some of the best coffee I have ever tasted. Every from their craft lattes to their pour overs are incredible.

If you want GOOD coffee, HEX is your spot.

They also sell their own roast that is used in various shops around town. One of the best blends I've tasted.

Awesome quality craft coffee and atmosphere
Lucky to have chosen this spot
Easy to find location
easy parking
Friendly staff
Chill and clean
Love the vanilla latte and chic interior.
Awesome little dog friendly coffee spot off of South Blvd - amazing draft lattes, iced mochas, interesting rotating features, and a nice place to sit and work as well.
Great espresso drinks.
the vanilla latte was delicious!

Hex Coffee Bar is Amezing! They serve cold and hot brew. I ordered espresso with milk and it was flavorful, one the best coffee I have ever tried. The service is good and the place was always clean. I love being here.
By far the best espresso and lattes we have ever had. Very friendly staff, good vibes place. Will Visit again often.
Great coffee with a good vibe. It was spacious inside which can be difficult to find with some coffee shops.

We use Hex as our coffee provider at Industrious Charlotte for over 200 members daily.  Our community loves the Form Blend and the Cold Brew. Deliveries are on time, consistent, and the crew is exceptional to work with! Thanks Hex!
All I got to say is dirty matcha!

I love the look of this place, staff and clients are friendly, fast wifi, and quality coffee. I think what sets this place apart too is they allow pups! It's the perfect place to chill with friends or get a lot of work done!
Modern and comfortable. The draft latte is delicious too!! Great place to work or catch up with friends!
Not impressed. Coffee was decent. Beer is local so that's good but the bartender had zero personality and was busy talking to friends.

Very tasteful environment and even more tasteful coffee! Every experience is great at Hex.
p.s. they have the best playlist around
Everything is good, but highly recommend the vanilla latte on tap!
Best coffee in the Charlotte area
The vanilla latte tastes great but let me take another sip... Yep, still great!
Delicious coffee, excellent service
They do good work.
I walked in and said "I'm from coffee snob capital " and the barista asked "Melbourne Australia?" Amazing coffee, felt like I was back home. Great atmosphere too.

Found this place online as we were driving through North Carolina to Geogia and wanted to checkout a local roaster. The staff were great, made a nice shot and they gifted us a bag of coffee. Plus I love their packaging. Good coffee and great staff!
Best hot chocolate I've ever had!
Fantastic small shop. Trust me, they definitely know what they're doing when it comes to quality coffee.
Hand crafter coffee every time. Love having meetings here.
Phenomenal coffee! Great staff! Very friendly! Superb roast profile!
Love this place!
Best coffee in town by far !!!

Great coffee and and even better staff! The owners of Hex are knowledgeable and the nicest people. Every item on the menu is thoughtfully prepared and presented. Great baked goods from Whisk and Wood and fun pop ups from time to time. Can't say enough good things about their coffee and their team!

My only complaint about HEX: I wish it was bigger.

Their Golden Milk latte is one of the best in town -- and if you add a shot of espresso, it's the perfect non-coffee pick me up.

I love coming here in the afternoon to finish my work day -- and if I'm up for it, grabbing a beer when I'm done.

Great staff, great vibe, great coffee.
First time visit, staff was very friendly and helpful, even let us sample cold brew and seasonal macha drink. Will definitely come back!

Best coffee in Charlotte period. Don't expect a wide variety of syrups...you don't need them because the beans are full of flavor and stand out on their own. Give them a try without milk or extras and you'll be glad you did.
Hip coffee joint. Quiet meeting space. Accessible by train.
I been an avid fan and custoner since they opened their doors and drink their cold brew religiously.
the coffee taste burnt
Great coffee, great service, wonderful atmosphere! Thanks Chandler and Tanner

This place is a rare spot. It's got the feeling of an old, hidden church where the magic still runs strong in the earth. Peaceful and gentle, with a kind atmosphere.
Never have I seen someone treat coffee so reverantly, and never has it tasted as good. If you're ever in need of a moment of quiet repose and a good cuppa, this is the place.
Great coffee and cute little place. The fact that it is also a bar is a bit confusing. I wish there was some outdoor sitting but the coffee was delicious!

HEX coffee is a fantastic experience. They love the craft of coffee and it shows in everything they do. Molly the barista is a total star. She was super friendly and made an amazing latte. Do yourself a favor and go there for coffee.
Best coffee in Charlotte for sure!
Great local coffee spot with locally made pastries, delicious coffee and friendly staff.

GREAT coffee, though quite pricey (the reason for the 4 stars as opposed to 5). The staff is friendly and unpretentious (what I tend to expect at high-end coffeeshops) and always willing to answer questions. Their seasonal drinks are ON POINT - they think creatively when creating their menu, so you aren't getting the usual "peppermint mocha" or "pumpkin spice." They are very unique.
Keep in mind, it is a small espresso bar with limited menu, so don't expect 10 different flavor options. But their espresso is fantastic! I highly recommend it, even if just to treat yourself if you can't afford to spend $5 or more on a cup on a regular basis. Otherwise, I'd come here all the time!
Amazing coffee, great service

Best coffee in Charlotte by far. Pretty expensive ($5) but worth it if you're treat(ing) yo self. They're coffee  drinks come in interesting but delicious flavors, I think I had a dark chocolate rose latte or something similar which was so good. They're iced vanilla draft  is a go-to for me. The location is great to work or just relax and they have an excellent variation of bottled and draft beers. Easy going and laid back vibe.
Amazing mochas & draft vanilla lattes!
Favorite coffee in all of Charlotte! Creative, unique brews

My go to coffee shop in Charlotte! Best vanilla latte I've had so far any where and believe me I've been to many. This is not your neighborhood Starbucks with extensive menu, they specialize in lattes and espresso drinks.
These guys know their beans well. Come for the coffee, stay for the chill-ass atmosphere.
Great
wow so good
Delicious coffee. Could use more options on sizes.

I am a huge fan of locally roasted coffee and Hex does not disappoint. I just moved here from Minnesota where we had the likes of Spyhouse and Dogwood coffee roasters (which are the best I've ever had) so it was good to see that Hex is on that same exact level.

And to top it off, the staff/owners are great people and very helpful. They showed me how to step up my french press game at home so now I buy all my beans from these guys so I can have Hex at home.

Also, it's a great place to come get some work done (I work from home) during the day.

But wait, it gets even better: They have an outstanding beer bottle shop! I know, right? Coffee AND craft beer? Yeah, these guys know exactly what they're doing and I love supporting them. It's great to stop by every morning during my bike ride to get a coffee and then in the evenings stop in for a nice craft draft.
Always the perfect Latte.
Great cappuccino!
Good selection, great tasting, dairy-free alts, variety of non-coffee beverages, nice aesthetic, nice staff. Yeah, I'd recommend giving it a 'shot'.
a good variety of different beers and great coffee
Awesome lattes and other seasonal drinks
Had a great experience. AG was my barista and she does great work!
Incredible coffee.
Best coffee in Charlotte! Love these guys and what they are doing. Always bringing something fresh
Fantastic coffee shop.  Excellent environment.  Coffee has a very unique flavor which I actually enjoyed!
Love the draft latte! Not too sweet.
Great spot!
Isolated.  Nothing wrong with their product.  Not the type of place you b seek out and then drive to.  Patrons more likely to be locals/pedestrians.
Great vanilla latte!
John Michael does an exceptional job. The coffee is always on par!
Coffee!
Great espresso!
Hex won't disappoint the snobbiest of snobby coffee geeks <3
Great cortado, relaxed atmosphere, helpful staff.
This place is cute and I'd love to hang out or come back for beers.
Great spot. Awesome coffee.

Fantastic espresso bar.
It becomes immediately clear that they care for serving people their craft with a tastefully charming, earnest and peaceful passion.
Innovative stuff too.
Try whatever you can get them to recommend, I think they enjoy everything they serve.
Hands down the best coffee in town!!
Great service!
Excellent latte.

Went there because it was recommended as a place to get coffee and work. There wireless connection didn't work and there were few seats near power outlets. Poor coffee selection, so I got a latte I didn't want. It was good enough.
Super limited options with an enivornment i would describe as borderline sterile.
A+ for atmosphere. Good coffee but could offer more options; the menu is pretty limited. Staff was super friendly though and the coffee was brought to my table (no standing around).
Really great coffee and scones. The staff were friendly and helpful.
Coffee and staff are both fantastic.
Baristas are top notch. Coffee is top notch. Favorite shop in Charlotte.
My cappachino was delicious!! I wasn't sure when I walked in  if it was the best place for me to work, but I sat down and enjoyed my couple of hours here very much!
Inside of Good Bottle Co. Quality coffee, but small selection of drinks.
Hex coffee is the best coffee in Charlotte! Recently, they have revamped their seating which has helped make a better feel for meetings and space to study!

EXCELLENT espresso, great beans.  Don't expect a full coffee shop, this is literally a counter with an espresso machine inside of a bottle shop/tap room.  However, there is lots of room to sit and chill!

Premium espresso/coffee inside a beer spot. Best of both worlds.
Get a 6 pack of unique selections and a cortado or espresso.
Exceptionally friendly staff, great service, and wonderful espresso drinks. Definitely will be back next time we're in Charlotte
Hex is a favorite place for coffee. Tanner's friendly service is worth the drive from Lake Norman.
Possibly the best coffee in Charlotte!
Cool coffee space in a beer shop. Espresso only no drip coffee. They do offer a coffee shot but it's only 8oz
A great espresso bar inside a beer store. Service was friendly and quick. Espresso and latte were both great and what you should expect from an espresso bar.
Best coffee and espresso in Charlotte.  I don't even like coffee but will drink a double espresso here.  They love coffee and make it right every time!

FABULOUS! The coffee is incredible, the service is impeccable, and for when coffee just isn't enough they also serve a great selection of beers! Nothing that I do t absolutely love about this place. Wish I lived nearer!!
Love the coffee and the people who make it.  can't wait to see what the future holds for you guys!

The latte here was something special. It ranks up there with the espresso drinks I've had in Seattle and Chicago. Also, the barista was super nice and is a fan of the band American Football. So, you should definitely check this place out when you get a chance.

As someone whose been to most Charlotte coffee shops (including Central Coffee, Rush Espresso, The Daily Press, Amelie's, Smelly Cat, Dilworth Coffee, and Not Just Coffee) I can tell you that HEX exceeds them all, pushing Not Just Coffee to a close second.

This place came to be because three guys with deep love for quality coffee started up their own shop OUT OF POCKET. This passion and dedication caries straight over into their drinks. I won't go into their whole menu, but I assure you, everything they serve from their cortado to their lemon seltzer shandy is absolutely delicious and the best in its class.

Prepare your taste buds, and please, go support these guys!
